name: com.oxioapps.myapp
description: A sample Apache Cordova application with Svelte.

scripts.switch-to-module: jq '. + {type: "module"}' package.json > tmp_package.json && mv tmp_package.json package.json
scripts.switch-to-commonjs: jq 'del(.type)' package.json > tmp_package.json && mv tmp_package.json package.json
scripts.cordova-browser: npm run switch-to-module && vite build && npm run switch-to-commonjs && cordova run browser
scripts.cordova-android: npm run switch-to-module && vite build && npm run switch-to-commonjs && cordova run android

author: OxioApps
